Kushina uses the tracking seal she put on her son to find him
114.content:
Naruto was running through Konoha and looked for a place ot hide. 'Gotta, gotta hide! Gotta find a place where she won't find me!' He went into a building and does his best to suppress his chakra signal. He sighed and stayed as quiet as he could which was a first for someone like him as he felt the area start to shake. 'Oh man i hope mom doesn't find me in here! I still can't believe she wants to revive our clan with me!'


"NARU-CHAN WHERE YOU ARE SWEETIE?!" Bellowed a loud female voice and the area began to quake violently and in rythm as if massive footsteps were the cause which they were as Naruto's very own mother Kushina waddled into the area, only she was much much MUCH bigger than expected. She stood over 30 ft tall towering over all the buildings in the village and was very very obese. Her massive belly was 4500 ft across and was full of love handles with a bellybutton that could swallow an entire apartment, it alone weighted 6,000 Lbs. Her massive tits were each around 2500 ft across and weighted 4000 Lbs each. Her massive jiggling ass was around 5000 ft across and each cheek weighed 10,000 lbs. She had masive thick jiggly legs, arms, and massive pudgy feet and hands. her massive thunder thighs weighed the same as her breasts and helepd support her collosal fat ass. She was completely nude with no clothes able to fit her. She was designing a specialized seal that would allow any clothes she wanted to grow big enough to fit her but she was still working on it. But right now finding her one and only baby was more important. Naruto had snuck out last night while she slept. He normally slept on her massive vast fat belly.

But this morning Kushina awoke to find her son missing and worried greatly on where he might be. She waddled uncaring of anyone who were crushed under her massive fat feet as she waddled past, all she cares about is her own child. She wants to revive the Uzumaki clan with her own child and knows how to do it one of her relatives worked on a special family seal that would allow related uzumaki family members to copulate to make an offspring, even with her being now as massive as she was. She planned to birth several more kids with her son. Kushina's massive ass and belly jiggled as she walked her jiggling fat sometimes crashed into a building and wrecked it, destroying it.

Kushina came to the building Naruto was hiding in and looked around the arena. "NARU-CHAN MOMMY WILL FIND YOU, WE WILL REVIVE THE UZUMAKI CLAN TOGETHER BABY! YOU CAN'T RESIST FOR MUCH LONGER!"
114.title: The ssbbw giantess mother

info.brief_description: Kushina Uzumaki has turned evil and become very obese and wants her son all to herself
info.description:
Kushina Uzumaki has turned completely evil and become very obese. She loves her son like a man

Now Kushina can already be massively obese and had just been wearing a genjutsu all this time, gain weight, or magically become fat from a scroll. You can make her any weight

paring: Kushina X Naruto main pairing for Naruto . Other characters can try and take Naruto. But no one else for Kushina or Naruto but each other. Maybe in side chapters Kushina might share with Hinata.

Side pairing: Naruto X Hinata (in side chapters)

Deaths are allowed. But no killing off Naruto or Kushina. The other characters can attempt to rescue Naruto but must fail. No gay or yuri allowed. Otherwise go crazy.
